title: Scott McCloud - Zot 1-36
description:
Note: For more than a month I wasn't able to upload .torrent files to TPB.
Now that I am, I'll be uploading my other comic torrents here, hope you like 'em


Zot! is a comic book series published by Eclipse Comics in 1984.
It was created, written and illustrated by Scott McCloud.
The first 10 issues are in color and the rest (11-36) are in black & white.
This torrent includes the 10ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â½ and 14ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â½ special issues.

It was released in a time when the so-called "grim n' gritty" comics were starting to become popular.
But this series takes a back-to-basis aproach, and puts enfasis in the fun factor of comics.
It was a brilliant work that was recognized with a Jack Kirby award in 1985 and nominations for both Einer and Harvey awards.

For more info:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zot!
http://www.comics.org/series.lasso?SeriesID=2929
